title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 252.2 - Charge; form; filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 252.2 - Charge; form; filing

State Regulations
A charge shall be in writing. The original shall be
supported by a declaration. The charge shall also be signed and dated. The
charge shall be electronically filed with the director of PEPR (see section
250.11
of this Title). Charge
forms will be supplied by the board upon request and are available at the
board's website. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

252.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
